author: Simon Difford
description: A White Lady in a sugar-rimmed glass with the addition of a dash of grenadine and substituting lemon juice for lime.
name: Boxcar
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
